trans-unit.source: Peace Talks
trans-unit.target: 和平会谈

trans-unit.resname: MGB·1 | Peace Talks | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.
trans-unit.target: 在本回合及下回合中，玩家不可宣告攻击，亦不可使用以任何永久性或玩家为目标的咒语或异能。

trans-unit.source: Ovinomancer
trans-unit.target: 羊化术师

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，除非你将三个由你操控的基本地移回其拥有者手上，否则牺牲之。

trans-unit.source: {T}, Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.
trans-unit.target: {T}，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上：消灭目标生物。它不能重生。该生物的操控者派出一个0/1绿色绵羊衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Dark Privilege
trans-unit.target: 黑暗特权

trans-unit.resname: MGB·3 | Dark Privilege | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1.\nSacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+1/+1。\n牺牲一只生物：重生受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.source: Necrosavant
trans-unit.target: 死灵学者

trans-unit.source: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {3}{B}{B}，牺牲一个生物：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回战场。只能于你的维持中起动。

trans-unit.source: Urborg Mindsucker
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格吮灵妖

trans-unit.resname: MGB·5 | Urborg Mindsucker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: oB，牺牲CARDNAME：目标对手随机弃一张牌。将此异能视为巫术使用。

trans-unit.source: Vampirism
trans-unit.target: 吸血教义

trans-unit.source:
Enchant creature
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.
Other creatures you control get -1/-1.
trans-unit.target: 你在CARDNAME进场之下回合维持阶段开始时抽一张牌。\n只要你每操控此生物以外的其他一只生物，受此结界的生物就得+1/+1。所有你所操控的其他生物得-1/-1。

trans-unit.source: Wicked Reward
trans-unit.target: 邪恶的奖赏

trans-unit.resname: MGB·7 | Wicked Reward | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nTarget creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一只生物：目标生物得+4/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Viashino Sandstalker
trans-unit.target: 凡尔西诺沙潜者

trans-unit.resname: MGB·8 | Viashino Sandstalker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷（你操控此生物的该回合中，它便可以攻击）

trans-unit.resname: MGB·8 | Viashino Sandstalker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the end step, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: 在回合结束时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。 （若它在场上，才将其移回手上）

trans-unit.source: Bull Elephant
trans-unit.target: 蛮象

trans-unit.resname: MGB·9 | Bull Elephant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return two Forests you control to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将两张你操控的森林移回拥有者手上，否则埋葬CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: King Cheetah
trans-unit.target: 帝王猎豹

trans-unit.resname: MGB·10 | King Cheetah | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用CARDNAME。
